name: Ternary Software & Hospitality Pvt. Ltd
overview:
Ternary Software & Hospitality Pvt. Ltd. is formed by group of NRI entrepreneurs and investors. Company aim to deliver innovative & value for money online solutions & services to itâ€™s customers. We pride ourselves on our customer satisfaction.

bookaHotel.in, an online Hotel booking portal launched recently, provides real time information about Hotels, room price & availability, and real time booking facility using secure payment gateway.

Also, bookaHotel.in offers Hotels to connect with a growing online and offline travel market and provide one stop platform for Hotels to advertise their facilities and services to customers in a way to maximize bookings.

Based in Nagpur, India, company has dedicated trained customer support to serve customer over the phone along with online website.

external_links.title: Book Budget, Discounted, Luxury Hotels and Resorts in India on bookaHotel.in
